p: St Louis Circuit Court Case Files July Term 1836 No. 141
Julia- alias Mary Ann, infant of color
See original Freedom Suit, Mary Ann, also known as Julia, vs. Robt. Duncan, Nov. 1834, No. 46

Note: Phillis, free woman of color, on behalf of her daughter, Julia alias Mary Ann, sues for Julia's free Julia held by Robert Duncan and woman, Sally Adams, who lifed with him as hise wife. Julia sold to th infant by John L. Sutton; child was sickly an no one could be found to take her off the hands of Duncan & who kept her and cared for her with great expense. Duncan & Adams claim the care for her under restraint and Julia does not wish "To go with the person calling herself her mother"; case discharged.
